DOC.brief_summary: The principle purpose multicenter trial determine definition , time percentage nosocomial RSV epidemic throughout Turkey . In addition , secondary purpose trial determine prevention strategy spread Respiratory Syncytial Virus ( RSV ) neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) .
DOC.brief_title: Respiratory Syncytial Virus Infection Neonatal Intensive Care Units Throughout Turkey : Prospective Multicenter Study ( TurkNICU-RSV Trial )
